title: Why can't I search for someone's posts?
body:
Come on Riot. If I decide I hate someone, how am I suppose to systematically downvote all their posts? Huh? HOW??!!

... In all honesty. I just wanna see more Laughing Fish posts. That's all.

replies.body:
You click on their name, and it'll take you to their post history. To aide you in your quest for more fish, take this:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Laughing%20Fish

> ... In all honesty. I just wanna see more Laughing Fish posts.

A wise choice
http://media.giphy.com/media/sp685iuIEGuys/giphy.gif
No no no. All of these responses are wrong. What you truly need to do to find Laughing Fish posts is to let the Force guide you to them.
